commentary: Feels bad, man. Hey, let's forget this idiot's pain for a moment and reflect on an achievement we finally unlocked. We've met all twelve trolls now and have been thoroughly introduced to each of them. What a ride. Maybe now I can finally chill out and stop saying so much about them on a metatextual level, and about everything else going on for that matter? Maybe I can just start saying some jokes instead. Ah, to dream. Well, anyway, back to writing utterly crushing volumes of literary wank extolling the brilliance of my own whimsically produced, decade-old nonsense.
